text:
Hello guys,
Is there any API we can get user current plan details or allow module permission?
Hi Everyone, We are using HubSpot api to get contact properties, does the api support any query param using which we can get only writable properties and ignore the readonly properties?

Hi <@U05RHRA9KL6> :wave-yeti: thank you for bringing this issue to our attention and for the detailed feedback regarding the need for users to reconnect the app and the challenges around granting temporary super admin privileges. I can understand how this creates friction in your workflow. I'll relay this feedback internally and may follow up with additional questions!
Sure thing Hannah, happy to answer any other questions.

Hello All, New customer to HubSpot, working through integrating to our external Profile and Identity management system. From reviewing the slack channels and help it is clear the hs_marketable_status (Marketing Status) property is read only and not updatable via the API.  Has anyone managed to get any clarification from HubSpot why this is the case or the rational? It seems a very odd approach and don't understand the logic behind it. Reverting to manual updates or workflows is incredibly inefficient.

Hi

I wanted to know that why are we experiencing a high number of connection denials when calling webhooks for task status change events? this was working fine before 2 days and all of sudden its giving error.
Just for info i am using Beta.

can anyone help on this please.

Hi,

I'm trying to export data via python. I'm using the example listed in the documentation <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/exports|here>, but just get this error:
```from HubSpot.crm.exports.export.async import PublicExportRequest, ApiException
                                    ^
SyntaxError: invalid syntax```
It seems the example listed in the documentation does not work.
Does anyone have a fix? Any help is greatly appreciated!

When I try with an underscore after async:
```from HubSpot.crm.exports.export.async_ import PublicExportRequest, ApiException```
I get this error:
```ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'HubSpot.crm.exports'```

We are needing to duplicate a whole bunch of Email Templates into various languages (11 langs x 15 templates = 165 new templates). I noticed there’s no clone endpoint (like the one on email marketing) for templates in the api. Does anyone have a suggestion so I don’t need to create 165 templates via the UI?
Bumping this… anyone have any idea?
